name: Mito Health
headline: AI Preventive Health Provider
description: Mito Health uses blood work and scans to tell our customers what to do to prevent disease and live longer. Customers love having a health expert in their pocket, who knows all about them, and can offer trusted advice. Our program has already helped customers detect cancer early and cut their risk of heart disease.
tags: industry:anti-aging; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:consumer-health-services; industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ryan Ware, Founder
founders.description: Medical doctor with 8 years of clinical practice. Trained as a surgical resident, and shifted focus to preventive medicine. Interested in making preventive medicine accessible to all.

founders.name: Teeming Chew, Founder
founders.description: Teeming is the Co-founder and Chief Product at Mito Health, an AI preventive health provider that uses blood and scans to prevent diseases and live longer. He holds a CS degree and was early employee in multiple early-stage tech startups. Prior to Mito Health, Teeming was the Co-founder and CTO at Seedly, a personal finance platform with millions of users in Singapore, which successfully exited in a $10 million acquisition.

founders.name: Joel Kek, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Mito Health

founders.name: Kenneth Lou, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Mito Health, building an AI doctor to help change the way we approach longevity and healthspan.

# Better insights through blood work
In-depth bloodwork & holistic health advice, backed by the latest longevity science.
[Get started](https://mitohealth.com/<#pricing>)
## Codeveloped with leading researchers and engineers

## Blood work and personalized insights to help you live healthier for longer
Fitness
Achieve peak physical performance
Whether you’re competing in an event, running your first marathon, or just aiming to improve performance, we should all treat ourselves like athletes. Measure your current physical fitness, body composition, and blood markers related to optimizing performance and recovery to maximize your training. 
[Optimize your performance](https://mitohealth.com/<#pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd4b57bc7ecddbafb69a_1%20-%20Peak%20performance.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668ce0496dd4cc069a57fbba_1.2%20-%20Peak%20performance.webp)
Longevity
Reduce the risk of future disease
Identify what diseases you’re at highest risk of right now. Based on your inherited predisposition, lifestyle behaviours and biomarkers, we’ll tell you what conditions you should or shouldn’t worry about, and what to do to stave them off.
[Get your risk assessment](https://mitohealth.com/<#pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd4b67e32d8d582b31ce_2%20-%20Disease%20risk.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd4bda8138485e14a293_2.2%20-%20Disease%20risk.webp)
Energy
Stress management and recovery
Effective stress management is essential for optimal performance and overall well-being. Learn to monitor and manage stress levels through targeted assessments of your physical and mental health. Incorporate recovery strategies and resilience-building practices to enhance your ability to cope with stress and maintain peak performance.
[Enhance your wellbeing](https://mitohealth.com/<#pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd4ba9714fffd49adaf2_3%20-%20Stress%20%26%20recovery.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd4bf0f95d25035c26c3_3.2%20Stress%20%26%20recovery.webp)

## Your roadmap to preventing disease and living better
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/668cdd3a3a02f05af90ade28_Measure.webp)
Comprehensive lab tests to get the most in-depth picture of your health

This is a combination of two sections. The pre-section text refers to the darker background. It is by default hidden for easy editing.
## What to expect when you join
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/673573cc26620adac53f1f0e_get-started-dark-03.png)
A holistic record of your health
Your family history, lifestyle habits, and past test insights — all in one place for a holistic view. We go beyond blood work to provide comprehensive insights tailored to you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/66e0dcf426b41a4ed9d69796_get-started-dark-02.avif)
Health advisor in your pocket
Whether you're trying out a new supplement or exercise routine, our AI-driven health advisor helps you track progress and stay on top of your game. Mito MD knows your unique profile, giving you advice and action plans tailored to your goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/6696559ae17e6640088493b7_get-started-dark-01.png)
Continuous testing at affordable rates
From your first blood test and beyond, we’re here to guide you. Track your progress, see how lifestyle changes are working, and get reminders on when to retest—all with insights that keep you motivated and moving toward better health.
## Get started today

Science-Backed Longevity — Delivered Weekly
Subscribe to live longer, feel better, and age smarter.Discover key longevity breakthroughs and how they work for you.
Thank you! You have subscribed to our newsletter

# How it works
## 1. Measure your baseline
We'll measure your baseline with a lab test analyzing [90+ biomarkers](https://mitohealth.com/<https:/mitohealth.com/sg/biomarkers>). You can choose to have a licensed phlebotomist visit your home for a convenient blood draw or visit our centrally located satellite clinic in Singapore.
## 2. Our doctor will interpret your results
Our doctors leverage AI to uncover details that routine analysis tends to miss. This takes into account your past lab results, family health history, lifestyle, and goals for the future.
## 3. Access your personalized health insights and optimization plan
Unlock unparalleled health and longevity insights, as well as tailored recommendations across supplements, nutrition, exercise and sleep.
## Upgrade your health with advanced testing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65d7122d84dc311ef5ca925b_658ad43daa0e65ff77860ffb_resource-database-ZN35I_jq7_M-unsplash-p-500.webp)
### Oral Glucose Tolerance Test (OGTT)
This test is used to measure how well your body can process a larger amount of sugar. Glucose and Insulin are tested at 30 min, 60 min, and 90 min.
$139 - $179
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65c06f3549bc1f2ae81003ed_chuttersnap-F-epeK8YsWs-unsplash%20\(1\).webp)
### Consultation with Mito Longevity Doctor
Book a 1:1 virtual consultation with our Longevity Doctor, Dr Ryan Ware.
$200
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65ba02dcc0f71154e7b58296_national-cancer-institute-L7en7Lb-Ovc-unsplash.webp)
### Early Cancer Liquid Biopsy (LucenceINSIGHT™ PLUS)
Multi-cancer screening with a single blood draw by testing for 50 cancers (Lung, Breast, Colorectal, Prostate, Liver, Nose, Bile Duct, Pancreas, Acute & Chronic Myeloid Leukemia and more), looking at DNA fragments released from cancer cells into the blood. With 99.0% Specificity.
$3,669
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d539f7a0396036425d140_RMR%202.avif)
### Resting Metabolic Rate Analysis
RMR testing is a significantly more accurate way of determining your daily energy / calorie expenditure. Understanding your metabolic rate is useful in determining your caloric needs and requirements to take control of your weight and body composition.
$149
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d534e3a1fc8aff4e6ab9b_VO2%20Max.avif)
### VO2max Testing
VO2max is a measurement of the maximum amount of oxygen your body is able to consume during exertion. This is an accurate measure of your cardiorespiratory fitness, evaluating the efficiency of your lungs, heart, circulation and muscle. This is performed on a treadmill or bike while connected to a machine that analyses the air you breathe in and out.
$199
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/658a9637d57b24040015be9d_warren-umoh--qycBqByWIY-unsplash.jpg)
### Early Cancer Liquid Biopsy (LucenceINSIGHT™)
Multi-cancer screening with a single blood draw by testing for 12 cancers (Lung, Breast, Colorectal, Prostate, Liver, Nose, Bile Duct, Pancreas), looking at DNA fragments released from cancer cells into the blood. With 99.0% Specificity.
$2,099
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d5364a2cda12f26023487_Gut%20Microbiome.avif)
### Gut Microbiome Test
Analyse the trillions of microorganisms in your gut, your gut microbiome, to better understand your gut health and how your diet, lifestyle and supplements may interact with the rest of your body
$400
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d536eefb66ec40e3bcdfb_Tumour%20Marker%20Screen%20Panel.avif)
### Tumour Marker Screen Panel
Inclusive of Male (AFP, CEA, CA-19.9, EBV, B-HCG) Or Female (AFP, CEA, CA19.9, EBV, CA153)
$69
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/6568b6682916b35dce1355f6_Dexa.avif)
### DEXA Body Composition and Skeletal Health Scan
Understand your body composition, visceral fat levels, and bone mineral density
$299
Recommended
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/6568b68378c8698d24007020_Allergy%20Panel.avif)
### Comprehensive Allergy Panel
Inclusive of 59 environmental and nutritional allergies (Dust mites, pollen, animals, gluten, milk, eggs, nuts, etc.)
$339
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d537c26150b39796d63bb_Hormone%20Panel.avif)
### Hormone Panel
Inclusive of Testosterone, Estradiol, SHBG, FSH, LH, Cortisol, DHEA, Insulin-like Growth Factor-1 (IGF-1)
$229
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/66daa938212c9396d135a18e_image%208.avif)
“It’s been great working with Mito Health. I especially love the dashboard for tracking my biomarkers over time and seeing long-term trends.”
Nir Eyal
|
Bestselling author (Hooked), Member since 2024
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/66daa9676b5b4d97855bae0e_image-1.avif)
“The comprehensive dashboard and insights were clear and helpful. I’ve started the recommended supplements and look forward to tracking my progress in a few months.”
Sienna
|
Member since 2024
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/66daa98c35c8ecd583b52355_image.avif)
“Think you’re healthy? Confirm it with Mito Health. Unlike most, they include ApoB testing by default, giving you a more complete picture of your health.”
Crystal Widjaja
|
Member since 2024
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/670caf3723deffa700a74e06_iconoir--nav-arrow-left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/670caf374458519e4d9c8990_iconoir--nav-arrow-right.svg)
## FAQs
Ask us anything about how Mito Health can help you live better, stronger and happier!
[View all questions](https://mitohealth.com/</sg/faq>)
## Can I claim this expense from my company?
Absolutely, this expense would fall under the wellness benefits for most companies. Your health plays a crucial role in your business's success, and similar to executive coaching or other professional services, investing in this service is essential. 
## Can I purchase Mito for my family or friends?
Yes, Mito will be a thoughtful gift for your family or friends. To purchase, simply head to our [Gift Mito](https://mitohealth.com/</sg/gift>) page.
## How is Mito different from my existing health screening provider?
Mito covers a comprehensive range of lab tests typically found in standard health screening packages and goes even further with access to advanced biomarkers, including heart, metabolic, liver, and cancer indicators. Additionally, Mito delivers personalized, longevity-focused insights and recommendations based on these test results.
## I have more questions, how do I contact you?
Here are a few ways to reach us. You can use our web messenger on the bottom right, send us an email at help@mitohealth.com or send us a Whatsapp at: https://wa.me/+6580430289
## What biomarkers are covered in the blood test and diagnostics?
Our comprehensive blood test covers key biomarkers related to your health and longevity, including cardiovascular health, liver function, kidney function, blood glucose levels, and various essential vitamins and minerals.
## What additional diagnostic tests do you offer?
In addition to the in-depth blood test, you can access a variety of advanced diagnostic tests at competitive prices. These include allergy screenings, DEXA scans, bone mineral density analyses, gut microbiome assessments, genetic testing, and cancer screenings.
## When and in what format will I get my test results?
Typically, you will receive your results within a week of testing. They will be available on your personal health dashboard in an easy-to-understand format.
## Think you’re healthy? It’s time to make sure.
[Join Mito Health](https://mitohealth.com/<#pricing>)

## Blood work and personalized insights to help you live healthier for longer
Fitness
Achieve peak physical performance
Whether you’re competing in an event, running your first marathon, or just aiming to improve performance, we should all treat ourselves like athletes. Measure your current physical fitness, body composition, and blood markers related to optimizing performance and recovery to maximize your training. 
Optimize your performance⟨1⟩

Longevity
Reduce the risk of future disease
Identify what diseases you’re at highest risk of right now. Based on your inherited predisposition, lifestyle behaviours and biomarkers, we’ll tell you what conditions you should or shouldn’t worry about, and what to do to stave them off.

Stress management and recovery

## What to expect when you join
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/673573cc26620adac53f1f0e_get-started-dark-03.png)
A holistic record of your health
Your family history, lifestyle habits, and past test insights — all in one place for a holistic view. We go beyond blood work to provide comprehensive insights tailored to you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/66e0dcf426b41a4ed9d69796_get-started-dark-02.avif)
Health advisor in your pocket
Whether you're trying out a new supplement or exercise routine, our AI-driven health advisor helps you track progress and stay on top of your game. Mito MD knows your unique profile, giving you advice and action plans tailored to your goals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c0c211bb52da1a5623915b/6696559ae17e6640088493b7_get-started-dark-01.png)
Continuous testing at affordable rates
From your first blood test and beyond, we’re here to guide you. Track your progress, see how lifestyle changes are working, and get reminders on when to retest—all with insights that keep you motivated and moving toward better health.

# How it works
## 1. Measure your baseline
We'll measure your baseline with a lab test analyzing 90+ biomarkers⟨3⟩. You can choose to have a licensed phlebotomist visit your home for a convenient blood draw or visit our centrally located satellite clinic in Singapore.
## 2. Our doctor will interpret your results
Our doctors leverage AI to uncover details that routine analysis tends to miss. This takes into account your past lab results, family health history, lifestyle, and goals for the future.
## 3. Access your personalized health insights and optimization plan
Unlock unparalleled health and longevity insights, as well as tailored recommendations across supplements, nutrition, exercise and sleep.
## Upgrade your health with advanced testing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65d7122d84dc311ef5ca925b_658ad43daa0e65ff77860ffb_resource-database-ZN35I_jq7_M-unsplash-p-500.webp)
### Oral Glucose Tolerance Test (OGTT)
This test is used to measure how well your body can process a larger amount of sugar. Glucose and Insulin are tested at 30 min, 60 min, and 90 min.
$139 - $179
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65c06f3549bc1f2ae81003ed_chuttersnap-F-epeK8YsWs-unsplash%20\(1\).webp)
### Consultation with Mito Longevity Doctor
Book a 1:1 virtual consultation with our Longevity Doctor, Dr Ryan Ware.
$200
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/65ba02dcc0f71154e7b58296_national-cancer-institute-L7en7Lb-Ovc-unsplash.webp)
### Early Cancer Liquid Biopsy (LucenceINSIGHT™ PLUS)
Multi-cancer screening with a single blood draw by testing for 50 cancers (Lung, Breast, Colorectal, Prostate, Liver, Nose, Bile Duct, Pancreas, Acute & Chronic Myeloid Leukemia and more), looking at DNA fragments released from cancer cells into the blood. With 99.0% Specificity.
$3,669
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d539f7a0396036425d140_RMR%202.avif)
### Resting Metabolic Rate Analysis
RMR testing is a significantly more accurate way of determining your daily energy / calorie expenditure. Understanding your metabolic rate is useful in determining your caloric needs and requirements to take control of your weight and body composition.
$149
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d534e3a1fc8aff4e6ab9b_VO2%20Max.avif)
### VO2max Testing
VO2max is a measurement of the maximum amount of oxygen your body is able to consume during exertion. This is an accurate measure of your cardiorespiratory fitness, evaluating the efficiency of your lungs, heart, circulation and muscle. This is performed on a treadmill or bike while connected to a machine that analyses the air you breathe in and out.
$199
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/658a9637d57b24040015be9d_warren-umoh--qycBqByWIY-unsplash.jpg)
### Early Cancer Liquid Biopsy (LucenceINSIGHT™)
Multi-cancer screening with a single blood draw by testing for 12 cancers (Lung, Breast, Colorectal, Prostate, Liver, Nose, Bile Duct, Pancreas), looking at DNA fragments released from cancer cells into the blood. With 99.0% Specificity.
$2,099
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d5364a2cda12f26023487_Gut%20Microbiome.avif)
### Gut Microbiome Test
Analyse the trillions of microorganisms in your gut, your gut microbiome, to better understand your gut health and how your diet, lifestyle and supplements may interact with the rest of your body
$400
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d536eefb66ec40e3bcdfb_Tumour%20Marker%20Screen%20Panel.avif)
### Tumour Marker Screen Panel
Inclusive of Male (AFP, CEA, CA-19.9, EBV, B-HCG) Or Female (AFP, CEA, CA19.9, EBV, CA153)
$69
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/6568b6682916b35dce1355f6_Dexa.avif)
### DEXA Body Composition and Skeletal Health Scan
Understand your body composition, visceral fat levels, and bone mineral density
$299
Recommended
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/6568b68378c8698d24007020_Allergy%20Panel.avif)
### Comprehensive Allergy Panel
Inclusive of 59 environmental and nutritional allergies (Dust mites, pollen, animals, gluten, milk, eggs, nuts, etc.)
$339
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642a85e52733f1267aed990c/656d537c26150b39796d63bb_Hormone%20Panel.avif)
### Hormone Panel
Inclusive of Testosterone, Estradiol, SHBG, FSH, LH, Cortisol, DHEA, Insulin-like Growth Factor-1 (IGF-1)
$229

## FAQs
Ask us anything about how Mito Health can help you live better, stronger and happier!
View all questions⟨10⟩
## Can I claim this expense from my company?
Absolutely, this expense would fall under the wellness benefits for most companies. Your health plays a crucial role in your business's success, and similar to executive coaching or other professional services, investing in this service is essential. 
## Can I purchase Mito for my family or friends?
Yes, Mito will be a thoughtful gift for your family or friends. To purchase, simply head to our Gift Mito⟨9⟩ page.
## How is Mito different from my existing health screening provider?
Mito covers a comprehensive range of lab tests typically found in standard health screening packages and goes even further with access to advanced biomarkers, including heart, metabolic, liver, and cancer indicators. Additionally, Mito delivers personalized, longevity-focused insights and recommendations based on these test results.
## I have more questions, how do I contact you?
Here are a few ways to reach us. You can use our web messenger on the bottom right, send us an email at help@mitohealth.com or send us a Whatsapp at: https://wa.me/+6580430289
## What biomarkers are covered in the blood test and diagnostics?
Our comprehensive blood test covers key biomarkers related to your health and longevity, including cardiovascular health, liver function, kidney function, blood glucose levels, and various essential vitamins and minerals.
## What additional diagnostic tests do you offer?
In addition to the in-depth blood test, you can access a variety of advanced diagnostic tests at competitive prices. These include allergy screenings, DEXA scans, bone mineral density analyses, gut microbiome assessments, genetic testing, and cancer screenings.
## When and in what format will I get my test results?
Typically, you will receive your results within a week of testing. They will be available on your personal health dashboard in an easy-to-understand format.
## Think you’re healthy? It’s time to make sure.
Join Mito Health⟨1⟩

Privacy Policy⟨25⟩Data Deletion⟨26⟩
Copyright Mito Health Pte. Ltd. MOH License No. 23M1077/MDS/002/232
The information provided by Mito Health is for improving your overall health and wellness only and is not intended to provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. We engage the services of partner clinics authorised to order the tests and to receive your blood test results prior to making Mito Health analytics and recommendations available to you. These interactions are not intended to create, nor do they create, a doctor-patient relationship. You should seek the advice of a doctor or other qualified health provider with whom you have such a relationship if you are experiencing any symptoms of, or believe you may have, any medical or psychiatric condition. You should not ignore professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of Mito Health recommendations or analysis. This service should not be used for medical diagnosis or treatment. All statements and recommendations contained herein have not been evaluated by the Health Sciences Authority. The recommendations contained herein are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. You should always consult your clinician or other qualified health provider before starting any new treatment or stopping any treatment that has been prescribed for you by your clinician or other qualified health provider.

generated_description:
Mito Health is a fresh player in the health tech arena, founded in 2023 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch S24. Based in San Francisco, this dynamic company is on a mission to revolutionize preventive health utilizing cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Their approach is straightforward: by analyzing blood work and scans, they provide personalized insights to help customers prevent diseases and extend their lifespan.

Imagine having a health expert in your pocket—this is precisely what Mito Health offers. Users appreciate the tailored advice they receive, which has already proven instrumental in early cancer detection and lowering heart disease risks. Their platform gives individuals a comprehensive view of their health, enabling data-driven decisions about lifestyle changes.

Mito Health operates with a team of eight talented employees under the guidance of Group Partner Tom Blomfield. This lean squad is deeply committed to expanding the world of anti-aging, digital health, and consumer health services. Their services are tagged with relevant industry keywords including *anti-aging*, *health-tech*, and *digital-health*, indicating a focus on innovative solutions that are both personal and effective.

Currently, Mito offers extensive health assessments through their flagship program, priced at $599. This includes over 90 biomarkers from blood, stool, and urine tests, alongside actionable health optimization plans that incorporate strategies for nutrition, sleep, exercise, and supplementation. Importantly, they provide regular support with continuous testing options to track progress over time.

Their website, [mitohealth.com](https://mitohealth.com/), serves as the hub for their offerings, including the ability to sign up for services, learn more about health topics through their blog, and explore advanced tests like cancer screenings and metabolic profiling.

What sets Mito Health apart is not just their tech-driven insights but also their accessibility; they cater to both individual consumers and potential corporate wellness programs. If you’ve ever wondered whether you’re truly healthy, now might be the time to dive deeper with Mito Health. They remind us that being proactive about health is key to living not just longer, but better.
